CONFIG.ua: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/130.0.0.0 Safari/537.36 Edg/130.0.0.0

values: 尽管；虽然；即便；纵然；然而；不过；可是；尽管如此；即使如此；虽说；虽则；虽则也
然而；尽管如此；但是；虽然如此；不过；可是；即便如此；尽管这样；话虽如此

word_group.phrase: as though there were no tomorrow

bilingual.target: 没有，虽然我听说过它们。

bilingual.source: "Though no one has an imagination like mine."
bilingual.target: “虽然没有人有像我这样的想象力。”

bilingual.source: While Mount St. Helens will most likely erupt again in the future, it looks as though that day won't be anytime soon.
bilingual.target: 虽然圣海伦火山未来很可能再次喷发，但看起来那一天不会很快到来。

bilingual.source: She forced a smile even though she was upset.
bilingual.target: 她虽然心情不好，但还是被迫微笑。

bilingual.source: This small town, though unconspicuous, has a lot of history.
bilingual.target: 这个小镇虽然不起眼，却有很多历史。

bilingual.source: The actor, though a co-star, performed exceptionally well.
bilingual.target: 这位演员虽然是配角，但表现非常出色。

bilingual.source: His contribution, though not worth mentioning, is still appreciated.
bilingual.target: 他的贡献虽然不足挂齿，但我们仍然感谢他。

bilingual.source: Their story, though solemn and stirring, is also full of hope.
bilingual.target: 他们的故事虽然悲壮，但也充满了希望。

bilingual.source: Even though he has a heart but no courage, he was still caught.
bilingual.target: 他虽然有贼心没贼胆，但还是被发现了。

bilingual.source: A rabbit, though it may not look like it, is also a rodent.
bilingual.target: 兔子虽然看起来不像，但也是一种啮齿动物。

yingyinNormal.en: Though you may have the anger now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然你现在很生气。

yingyinNormal.en: Even though you broke up with me. Yeah, even though I broke up with you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然你与我分了手。是啊，虽然我与你分了手。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh no. Not that guy. He does look like him though.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是那个，虽然很像。

yingyinNormal.en: And even though her feet were split open, I still felt jealous.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然她的双脚都干裂脱皮了，我仍然羡慕嫉妒恨。

yingyinNormal.en: Though while you sleep, we are apart, your mommy loves you with all her heart.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我们分开睡，但妈咪永远爱你们哦

yingyinNormal.en: So even though he's happy for me, it's just a little tough on him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 所以虽然他很为我开心，但其实他心里挺难受的。

yingyinNormal.en: Now even though I kissed you, that does not give you the right to demand sex from me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我亲过你，你也没有权利要我跟你上床。

yingyinNormal.en: I've not abandoned all my socialism. Even though it feels like it sometimes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我还没把社会主义思想全抛下，虽然有时几乎想不起它了。

yingyinNormal.en: What a big name for such a small piggy. It's quite nice, even though it's a boy.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这么小的宝宝却又这么响亮的名字。名字真不错，虽然他是一个小男孩。

yingyinNormal.en: Though I had been right much more than I had been wrong, I let one bad bet erase all my good ones.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我正确的次数比错误多，一个错误的赌注却抹杀了一切。

yingyinNormal.en: But, it turns out, Gorg was not here because of my invitation, though Gorg would have been happy to attend.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可事实上他们并不是我邀请来的，虽然他们很乐意接受邀请。

yingyinNormal.en: I know this to be a scandalous falsehood, though not wishing to injure him by supposing it possible, I instantly set off to make my sentiments known.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然我明知这是无稽之谈，虽然我不会那样看不起他，相信他真会有这种事情，我还是当机立断决定上这来一次，把我的意思说给你听。

yingyinNormal.en: You know the one from Poughkeepsie, even though she's a two hour train ride away, is really pretty, really smart, and a lot of fun.
yingyinNormal.zh: 波启浦夕那个女孩虽然住得远，但漂亮、聪明又有趣。

yingyinNormal.en: Kevin, can I ask you something? Yeah. I even though every feminist bone in my body will stop talking to me…
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯文，我能问你点事吗？当然。虽然我的女权主义思想会极力反对…

yingyinNormal.en: All right. You know how you say I never seize the day? Well, alright. Even though he's your super, I'm seizing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，你说我从不把握机会？他虽然是你们的管理员，我也要把握一下。

yingyinNormal.en: And you're gonna play the set list? Happy to. Even though I don't think anybody cares what I play. But yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会按着演出曲目表演对吧？非常乐意。虽然没有人在意我弹什么。但是，好的。

yingyinNormal.en: I always leave a part of me behind, Ella. Remember that. And your mother's here, too, though you see her not.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我一直都会牵挂着你，艾拉。你要记住，还有你的妈妈也在这，虽然你看不见她。

yingyinNormal.en: Though some dryers are much better than others, just make sure you dry them fully, and it shouldn't be a major problem.
yingyinNormal.zh: 虽然有些烘手机比较好，只要确保你完全地擦干手，应该就没什么大问题。

yingyinNormal.en: So I hope that whenever you see it, it will remind you that even though Rosie's friend gave up, you never should.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望无论何时当你看见它都会让你想起，虽然罗茜的朋友放弃了，你永远都不该放弃。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, not at first, but it was very intricate work and they said even though they lost their sight, it was all worth it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 本来不是的，但这工作非常伤眼力，她们说虽然她们眼睛瞎了，但这还是很值得的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 虽然; 尽管; 即使
不过; 可是; 然而

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.zh: 虽然; 尽管; 即使

examination_example.sentence: However, even <highlight>though</highlight> it's common, it's important to keep in mind that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，即使是这是很普遍的现象，我们还是要牢记。

examination_example.sentence: And <highlight>though</highlight> print ad sales still dwarf their online and mobile counterparts, revenue from print is still declining.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管平面广告销售仍然让在线和移动广告相形见绌，但平面广告的收入仍在下降。

examination_example.sentence: For example, many collegiate and professional football players qualify as obese, <highlight>though</highlight> their percentage body fat is low.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，许多大学和职业足球运动员符合肥胖标准，尽管他们的体脂百分比很低。

sense_info_list.en: used to add a fact or an opinion that makes the previous statement less strong or less important
sense_info_list.zh: 不过; 可是; 然而

examination_example.sentence: When the skills mismatch is in the broader economy <highlight>though</highlight>, the focus usually turns to government to handle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，当技能不匹配出现在更广泛的经济领域时，焦点通常会转向政府来处理。

examination_example.sentence: Such programs do not have to negatively affect the environment, <highlight>though</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，这类项目不必对环境产生负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: The court, <highlight>though</highlight>, may want to allow room for police to cite situations where they are entitled to more freedom.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，法院可能希望给警察留出空间，让他们列举自己有权获得更多自由的情况。

examination_example.sentence: It is curious that Stephen Koziatek feels almost as <highlight>though</highlight> he has to justify his efforts to give his students a better future.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不寻常的是，Stephen Koziatek觉得他好像必须要证明自己的努力，是为了给学生一个更好。

examination_example.sentence: It is as <highlight>though</highlight> 20 years of ever-tougher reforms of the job search and benefit administration system never happened.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 仿佛20年来对求职和福利管理系统越来越严格的改革从未发生过。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 意为“虽然；尽管”，语气较弱，多用于日常的口语表达。
意为“虽然；尽管”，语气较强，较为正式，多放在句首。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不过; 可是; 然而

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Though</highlight> cocoa seed is not an ingredient of the soda, they designed their bottle based on the seed's shape and large middle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管可可种子不是苏打水的成分，但他们根据种子的形状和膨大的中间部分设计了瓶子的样式。

examination_example.sentence: Even <highlight>though</highlight> we asked the management, they refused to give us detailed answers as to why they would do this with their collection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管我们问了管理部门，但他们拒绝向我们详细解答他们为什么要这样对待他们的收藏品。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Though</highlight> the validity of Hofstede's dimensions has been questioned, they have the singular benefit of having been in use for decades.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管 Hofstede 维度的有效性受到了质疑，但它们具有已经使用了十年的独特优势。

sense_info_list.en: used to add a fact or an opinion that makes the previous statement less strong or less important
sense_info_list.zh: 不过; 可是; 然而

word_usage.usage:
though表“尽管，虽然”时，不与but同时使用。
示例：虽然他80多岁了，但是似乎还很健康。
误 Though he is over eighty, but he seems still healthy.
正 Though he is over eighty, he seems still healthy.
正 He is over eighty, but he seems still healthy.

though与although的区别：
(1) 二者均可在从句中作连词，但although比though更为正式。
(2) though可作副词，表“然而”，although无此用法。
(3) 固定搭配如as though中的though，不可用although替换。

though连接的从句中，谓语为be动词，且从句与主句的主语相同时，从句的主语与be动词均可省略。
示例：His clothes, though old and worn, looked clean.
他的衣服虽然很旧，但看上去干干净净。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不过; 可是; 然而

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Nobody greeted the daughter and mother when they arrived, <highlight>though</highlight> the visit has been planned; nobody introduced them to the other residents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当女儿和她母亲到达时，没有人向他们打招呼，尽管这次访问已经计划好了；没有人把他们介绍给其他居民。

examination_example.sentence: That afternoon, even <highlight>though</highlight> I'd finished my assigned work, I was told to help other colleagues finish their work, too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那天下午，尽管我已经完成了分配给我的工作，我还是被告知要帮助其他同事完成他们的工作。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Though</highlight> it helps for children to investigate care facilities, involving their parents in the decision-making process may prove very important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这有助于儿童调查护理设施，让他们的父母参与决策过程可能是非常重要的。

sense_info_list.en: used to add a fact or an opinion that makes the previous statement less strong or less important
sense_info_list.zh: 不过; 可是; 然而

examination_example.sentence: This will, <highlight>though</highlight>, require a huge cultural shift.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这需要一个巨大的文化转变。

examination_example.sentence: Some studies have also found an impact for men, <highlight>though</highlight> a less noticeable one.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些研究也发现了对男性的影响，尽管不太明显。

examination_example.sentence: People there do drive responsibly, <highlight>though</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，那里的人开车确实很负责任。

word_usage.usage:
though表“尽管，虽然”时，不与but同时使用。
示例：虽然他80多岁了，但是似乎还很健康。
误 Though he is over eighty, but he seems still healthy.
正 Though he is over eighty, he seems still healthy.
正 He is over eighty, but he seems still healthy.

though连接的从句中，谓语为be动词，且从句与主句的主语相同时，从句的主语与be动词均可省略。
示例：His clothes, though old and worn, looked clean.
他的衣服虽然很旧，但看上去干干净净。

though与although的区别：
(1) 二者均可在从句中作连词，但although比though更为正式。
(2) though可作副词，表“然而”，although无此用法。
(3) 固定搭配如as though中的though，不可用although替换。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不过; 可是; 然而

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: used to add a fact or an opinion that makes the previous statement less strong or less important
sense_info_list.zh: 不过; 可是; 然而

examination_example.sentence: The place wasn't entirely authentic, <highlight>though</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，这个地方并不完全真实可信。

examination_example.sentence: I'm glad this is my last term here, <highlight>though</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过我很高兴这是我在这里的最后一学期了。

examination_example.sentence: But she recovered, <highlight>though</highlight> slowly, and was ready for discharge (出院) after four weeks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但她康复了，尽管很慢，而且四周后她就能出院了。

examination_example.sentence: Even <highlight>though</highlight> he often felt he would be discovered to be a no-talent.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即便他总感觉他是个没有天分的人。

examination_example.sentence: It was tiring work, but I looked forward to the pay, even <highlight>though</highlight> I wasn't sure how much it would amount to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一项累人的工作，但我很期待薪水，即便我不确定会有多少。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Though</highlight> the movie is 30 years old, most of the 250 seats were filled with teary-eyed audience.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 尽管这部电影已经有30年的历史了，但250个座位中的大部分都坐满了热泪盈眶的观众。

word_usage.usage:
though引导让步状语从句，不与连词but连用，但可以用yet或still：
Though the factory is small, yet its products are of very good quality.
这家工厂虽然小，产品质量却很好。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 不过; 可是; 然而

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Our English teacher is nice and patient <highlight>though</highlight> she is very strict with us.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然我们的英语老师对我们很严格，但她很好，也很有耐心。

examination_example.sentence: The doctors and nurses managed to save the lives of patients, <highlight>though</highlight> they didn't have enough medicine.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 医生和护士设法挽救了病人的生命，尽管他们没有足够的药物。

examination_example.sentence: He could find the way home <highlight>though</highlight> he was only three years old.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他只有三岁，但他能找到回家的路。

examination_example.sentence: It felt as <highlight>though</highlight> the tears going down our faces would never stop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 感觉好像眼泪从我们脸上流下来，永远不会停止。

examination_example.sentence: Grandma hugged me tight, and suddenly I felt as <highlight>though</highlight> a big stone was gone from my stomach.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 奶奶紧紧地抱着我，突然我觉得好像有一块大石头从我的肚子里消失了。

sense_info_list.en: used to add a fact or an opinion that makes the previous statement less strong or less important
sense_info_list.zh: 不过; 可是; 然而

examination_example.sentence: Tom and Jerry really love each other <highlight>though</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过汤姆和杰瑞真的很相爱。

examination_example.sentence: Their calls were not completely wasted, <highlight>though</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，他们的呼喊并没有完全浪费。

word_usage.usage:
though表“尽管，虽然”时，不与but同时使用。
示例：虽然他80多岁了，但是似乎还很健康。
误 Though he is over eighty, but he seems still healthy.
正 Though he is over eighty, he seems still healthy.
正 He is over eighty, but he seems still healthy.

though与although的区别：
(1) 二者均可在从句中作连词，但although比though更为正式。
(2) though可作副词，表“然而”，although无此用法。
(3) 固定搭配如as though中的though，不可用although替换。

though连接的从句中，谓语为be动词，且从句与主句的主语相同时，从句的主语与be动词均可省略。
示例：His clothes, though old and worn, looked clean.
他的衣服虽然很旧，但看上去干干净净。
